introduction: I am Shawn and my interests are in UI/UX, web development and games.
I find satisfaction in bringing software to life and getting people engaged into the experience.
Over the past few years, I have been working with vialab as a co-op student and for my undergrad thesis.
There I have uncovered my passion for web development as I built a couple of projects under the supervision of Christopher Collins and Mariana Shimabukuro.
I am a fresh 2022 Computer Science graduate on the job hunt and am working on personal projects.
